to perp.js top-level functions (deposit, withdraw, openPosition, closePosition, liquidate) This is the main user-facing contract. It: - Manages user wallets and protocol funds - Coordinates with all other contracts - Implements deposit/withdraw (USDC \u2194 internal balance) - Implements openPosition (Mode 3: specify total amount and leverage) - Implements closePosition - Implements liquidation","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"closePosition(uint256)":{"details":"Maps to perp.js lines 1152-1213 Algorithm: 1. Verify position exists and user owns it 2. Update carry 3. Execute vAMM close 4. Calculate trading PnL 5. Calculate carry PnL 6. Calculate payout = margin + totalPnL 7. Update tradeFund and user wallet 8. Decrease OI 9. Update position status","params":{"positionId":"Position ID to close"},"returns":{"totalPnl":"Total PnL (trading + carry)"}},"deposit(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of USDC to deposit (6 decimals)"}},"getFundBalances()":{"returns":{"insurance":"Insurance fund balance","protocol":"Protocol fees balance","trade":"Trade fund balance"}},"getWalletBalance(address)":{"params":{"user":"User address"},"returns":{"_0":"balance User's wallet balance (18 decimals)"}},"liquidate(uint256)":{"details":"Maps to perp.js lines 1253-1339 Algorithm: 1. Check if position is liquidatable 2. Update carry 3. Execute vAMM close 4. Calculate PnL and equity 5. Calculate liquidation fee 6. Pay liquidator 7. Handle remaining equity or bad debt 8. Decrease OI 9. Update position status","params":{"positionId":"Position ID to liquidate"}},"openPosition(bool,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Maps to perp.js lines 743-883 Mode 3 Algorithm: 1. Get effective fee rate (OI-skewed) 2. Calculate margin: margin = totalToUse / (1 + leverage * feeRate) 3. Calculate notional: notional = margin * leverage 4. Calculate fee: fee = notional * feeRate 5. Verify: margin + fee \u2248 totalToUse 6. Deduct totalToUse from user wallet 7. Add margin to tradeFund 8. Split fee: 50% insurance, 50% protocol 9. Execute vAMM trade 10. Create position 11. Update OI","params":{"isLong":"True for long, false for short","leverage":"Desired leverage (18 decimals, e.g., 10e18 = 10x)","totalToUse":"Total amount to use from wallet (18 decimals)"},"returns":{"positionId":"The created position ID"}},"withdraw(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount to withdraw (18 decimals internal)"}}},"title":"PerpEngine","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"USDC_TO_INTERNAL()":{"notice":"USDC has 6 decimals, we use 18 ","urls":["bzz-raw://3ea15d4e8c1cfab3b22891df4db69283063a5414de08a40fc75e46e609b34256","dweb:/ipfs/QmPCt7AHGS9jX76kT3i3voeHEyU7pLrBhkDkD1Jeu9tvfQ"]},"src/PositionManager.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbd7dcdc3e924196dcbf495807ad492c8c68bb33c6a57ff1f1fc8acbf2c24904c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9d58f4d1a0de35dcea0f03469bf274e90f2ad2affef7af77dd190788329dfcb8","dweb:/ipfs/QmSkWpMdACNA2Evw8XuvbF1seNBaf1zXVULKbEJCaq5qku"]}},"version":1}

closePosition(uint256).details: Maps to perp.js lines 1152-1213 Algorithm: 1. Verify position exists and user owns it 2. Update carry 3. Execute vAMM close 4. Calculate trading PnL 5. Calculate carry PnL 6. Calculate payout = margin + totalPnL 7. Update tradeFund and user wallet 8. Decrease OI 9. Update position status

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit (6 decimals)

liquidate(uint256).details: Maps to perp.js lines 1253-1339 Algorithm: 1. Check if position is liquidatable 2. Update carry 3. Execute vAMM close 4. Calculate PnL and equity 5. Calculate liquidation fee 6. Pay liquidator 7. Handle remaining equity or bad debt 8. Decrease OI 9. Update position status

openPosition(bool,uint256,uint256).details: Maps to perp.js lines 743-883 Mode 3 Algorithm: 1. Get effective fee rate (OI-skewed) 2. Calculate margin: margin = totalToUse / (1 + leverage * feeRate) 3. Calculate notional: notional = margin * leverage 4. Calculate fee: fee = notional * feeRate 5. Verify: margin + fee  totalToUse 6. Deduct totalToUse from user wallet 7. Add margin to tradeFund 8. Split fee: 50% insurance, 50% protocol 9. Execute vAMM trade 10. Create position 11. Update OI

params.isLong: True for long, false for short
params.totalToUse: Total amount to use from wallet (18 decimals)

USDC_TO_INTERNAL().notice: USDC has 6 decimals, we use 18 internally

tradeFund().notice: Trade fund (holds all active margin, 18 decimals)
